sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"断言，声称"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: assert, affirm, allege, maintain, testify, claim
means: assert ：主观意味强，指自认为某事就是如此，而不管事实如何。
affirm ：侧重在作出断言时表现出的坚定与不可动摇的态度。
allege ：多指无真凭实据，不提供证据的断言或宣称。
maintain ：与assert近义，但前者指坚决维护某种主张或观点。
testify ：多指在法庭作证，庄严地宣称自己所说属实。
claim ：可与assert换用，但语气弱一些，侧重指行为自己的权利提出要求他人承认。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"保存，储藏"之意。
means: maintain ： 指保持原样，不增不减
conserve ： 较正式用词，指小心地使用难以补充的资源或贵重物，免遭浪费或毁坏，以备不时之需。
preserve ： 侧重将物品完好无损地保存下来。
save ： 普通用词，指尽量少用，以争取数量上有所增加。
store ： 普通用词，指将物品存放，以备将来使用。

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =hold,表示"拿住,握住,支撑"; 2. 挽留

stems_affixes.word_buile: attain[v.达到;获得]+able可以……的→adj.可到达的,可得到的
pertain[[v.属于,关于]]男→adj.恰当的;有关的
contain包含,容纳+er表名词→n.容器;集装箱

stems_affixes.value_cn: 款待, 娱乐, 娱乐表演
stems_affixes.word_buile: entertain娱乐,招待+ment表名词→n.款待, 娱乐, 娱乐表演

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保留,保持,保持力,记忆力
stems_affixes.word_buile: retain[[v.适合,保持,保留]]→n.保留,保持,保持力,记忆力
attain[v.达到;获得]+ment表名词→n.完成,成就

stems_affixes.value_cn: 包含,容纳;容忍,抑制;可被……除尽
stems_affixes.word_buile: con全部+tain拿住,握住,支撑→全部拿住→包含,容纳
de加强动作+tain拿住,握住,支撑→拿住,拿下→拘留

stems_affixes.value_cn: 娱乐, 招待, 接受, 怀抱
stems_affixes.word_buile: enter进入,走进+tain挽留→使……挽留→休息,娱乐

stems_affixes.value_cn: 维修,保养,维持,供养,坚持,主张,支持
stems_affixes.word_buile: main=man+tain拿住,握住,支撑→用手拿住→坚持
ob加强动作+tain拿住,握住,支撑→拿到,获得
per始终+tain拿住,握住,支撑→始终拿着→属于,关于
re回来+tain拿住,握住,支撑→拿回来→保留
sus下面+tain握住→在下面握住→支撑

means.word_mean: 坚持; 主张; 坚守

sentences.en: He maintained the policy to be wrong.

entry.def: If you maintain something, you continue to have it, and do not let it stop or grow weaker.

example.ex: The Department maintains many close contacts with the chemical industry...
example.tran: 这个部门与化工行业保持着众多密切的联系。

example.ex: Push yourself to make friends and to maintain the friendships.
example.tran: 要求自己与人交友并保持友谊。

entry.def: If you say that someone maintains that something is true, you mean that they have stated their opinion strongly but not everyone agrees with them or believes them.

example.ex: He has maintained that the money was donated for international purposes...
example.tran: 他坚称这笔捐款将用于国际用途。

example.ex: Prosecutors maintain no deal was made...
example.tran: 原告坚持说不存在任何交易。

entry.def: If you maintain something at a particular rate or level, you keep it at that rate or level.
entry.tran: 保持，维持（在某一比率或水平上）

example.ex: The government was right to maintain interest rates at a high level.
example.tran: 政府维持高利率的做法是正确的。

example.ex: ...action is required to ensure standards are maintained at as high a level as possible.
example.tran: 要求采取行动确保标准维持在尽量高的水平上。

entry.def: If you maintain a road, building, vehicle, or machine, you keep it in good condition by regularly checking it and repairing it when necessary.

example.ex: ...a tough campaign to force authorities to maintain roads properly...
example.tran: 迫使当局妥善维修道路的艰难斗争

example.ex: The house costs a fortune to maintain...
example.tran: 维修这幢房子花销不菲。

entry.def: If you maintain someone, you provide them with money and other things that they need.

example.ex: He should pay and maintain you as well.
example.tran: 他得给你钱，还得供养你。

example.ex: ...the basic costs of maintaining a child.
example.tran: 抚养一个孩子的基本费用

means.word_mean: 1. keep in a certain state, position, or activity; e.g., "keep clean";

sentences.sentence: "hold in place"
"She always held herself as a lady"
"The students keep me on my toes"

means.word_mean: 2. keep in safety and protect from harm, decay, loss, or destruction;

sentences.sentence: "We preserve these archeological findings"
"The old lady could not keep up the building"
"children must be taught to conserve our national heritage"
"The museum curator conserved the ancient manuscripts"
"She alone sustained her family"
"The money will sustain our good cause"
"There's little to earn and many to keep"
"I keep a car in the countryside"
"She keeps an apartment in Paris for her shopping trips"
"keep a diary"
"maintain a record"
"keep notes"
"He maintained his innocence"
"The appellate court upheld the verdict"
"The pianist kept time with the metronome"
"keep count"
"I cannot keep track of all my employees"

sentences.en: The car has been well maintained and is in good condition.

sentences.cn: 乙方应指派受过专业培训的技术人员在安全的环境下进行设备保养和服务.
sentences.en: Party B shall provide trained employees to service and maintain the equipment in a safe condition.

sentences.cn: 保养维修机械设备并定时巡视.
sentences.en: Maintain and repair all mechanical equipment and regular inspections.

sentences.cn: 在试验过程中及试验完成后,维护保养相关试验设备.
sentences.en: Maintain all test equipments in good condition during test and test had been accomplished.

sentences.cn: 我公司是一家集专业设计 、 生产 、 销售 、 维修、保养一条龙服务的厂商.
sentences.en: Our company makes professional designing, producing, marketing, repairing and maintaining a coordinated process.

sentences.cn: 操作前, 必须按说明书的规定进行日常保养和定期保养.
sentences.en: Before operation, you should do the everyday maintaining according to the operation manual.

sentences.cn: 《设备作业指导书》:指导操作工人进行操作、维护 、 保养作业的文件.

sentences.cn: 这几个男人坚持说案发时他们在国外。
sentences.en: The men maintained (that) they were out of the country when the crime was committed.

sentences.cn: 她一直坚持说她是无辜的。
sentences.en: She has always maintained her innocence .

sentences.cn: 原告坚持说不存在任何交易。
sentences.en: Prosecutors maintain no deal was made...

sentences.cn: 有些人仍坚持认为地球是平的.
sentences.en: Some people still maintain that the earth is flat.

sentences.cn: 约伯历经艰辛仍坚持对上帝的信仰.
sentences.en: Job maintained his faith in God through hardships.

sentences.cn: 每天坚持用洗液冲洗, 才能保持下体卫生.
sentences.en: Persist in using the lotion day washing, in order to maintain lower body health.

sentences.cn: 我们坚持自豪我们的产品质量和及时交货.
sentences.en: We maintain pride in the quality of our products and with timely delivery.

sentences.cn: 他坚持说他是清白的.
sentences.en: He maintains his innocence.

sentences.cn: 该足球运动员坚持声称自己在比赛中未出错.
sentences.en: The football player maintained that he did nothing wrong in the match.

sentences.cn: 英国首相布朗坚持说,国际间的合作对解决眼下的难关至关重要.
sentences.en: Gordon Brown maintains that international cooperation is key in solving such issues.

sentences.cn: 于是她干脆摆脱, 可是保罗不肯罢休,坚持同她保持关系.
sentences.en: So she simply shake off, but Paul refused to and insist on maintaining relations with her.

sentences.cn: 他坚持认为这是错误的.
sentences.en: He maintained that it was wrong.

sentences.cn: 学校坚持认为,真正的探索不能是被强迫的,也是不能通过任何人为方式来塑造的.
sentences.en: The school maintains that true inquiry cannot be forced or artificially in any way.

sentences.cn: 他们还坚持认为科学家们为了支持多数人的观点而饱受压力的煎熬.
sentences.en: Scientists, they maintain, are under pressure to bolster the majority view.

sentences.cn: 他坚持他的意见.
sentences.en: He maintained his opinion.

sentences.cn: 大炸弹和大营一直坚持建立大帝国, 但在维护他们.
sentences.en: Big bombs and battalions have been consistent in creating big Empires, but not in maintaining them.

sentences.cn: 不, 正如其设计者所坚持的, 那是个玩具.
sentences.en: No, as it's own designer willingly maintains. It is a toy.

sentences.cn: 坚持这种主张显然是没有道理的.
sentences.en: It is clearly illogical to maintain such a proposition.

sentences.cn: 不要坚持你那错误主张啦.
sentences.en: Don't maintain your wrong opinion.

sentences.cn: 我坚持所有的学生应全受军训.
sentences.en: I maintained that military training should be given to all students.

sentences.cn: 马丁坚持认为他是对的.
sentences.en: Martin stoutly maintained that he was right.

sentences.cn: 他坚持认为不能怪他.
sentences.en: He maintained that he was not to blame.

sentences.cn: 她坚持该指控是毫无根据的.
sentences.en: She maintains that the accusation is groundless.

sentences.cn: 农场团体坚持认为,总统发送议案只是为了让立法机构盖章了事.
sentences.en: Farm groups maintain that the president only wants a rubber stamp from lawmakers.

sentences.cn: 但三人坚持自己是清白的.
sentences.en: All three have maintained their innocence.

sentences.cn: 他坚持认为, 凌晨雄鸡第一声啼叫.
sentences.en: Nothing can be compared, he maintains, with the first cock crow.

sentences.cn: 每个司机都坚持认为事故是对方的责任.
sentences.en: Each driver maintains that the accident was the other's fault.

sentences.cn: 然而, 另一些人则坚持男女生来平等.
sentences.en: Other people, however, maintain that both men and women are born equal.

sentences.cn: 他仍然坚持自己从严格的法律意义上说并未犯任何可以起诉的罪行.
sentences.en: He continued to maintain his technical innocence of any indictable offence.

sentences.cn: ISR坚持认为这些障碍会被克服.
sentences.en: ISR maintains that these obstacles can be overcome.
